Text:
I thought you were just a beautiful girl on the cover to sell songs, but its great melodic new age as an artist in a similar position I've fallen in love with you and I think everyone should hear what you have done, good luck, if you want to hear some of the more similar stuff I have done please contact me, the more professional musos we have together we can form a mini label where we give free music but charge royalties to itunes and such, I also can get you airplay in Australia, my email is bradley.a.myers@hotmail.com, please get in contact cause we can only go further togeter,
A potential partner and fan,
Bradley Myers
